text: Va agar Alloh ʙixohad, mardumro ʙa saʙaʙi korhoi ʙade, ki kardaand, favran ʙozxost kunad, ʙar rūji zamin heç çunʙandae ʙoqī naguzorad va lekin Alloh ʙo lutfu karami Xud çazoi onhoro to zamone muajjan (rūzi qijomat) ʙa ta'xir meandozad va cun muddataşon tamom şud, alʙatta, Alloh ʙa a'moli ʙandagoni xeş ogoh ast va az guftoru kirdor va pindori onho ʙoxaʙar ast, az in rū, cunon ki sazovor ast, podoşi a'molaşonro medihad
